question: Who of the following has been conferred with the 'Santokbaa Humanitarian' award 2018?
option3: Kailash Satyarthi and A S Kiran Kumar
answer: Kailash Satyarthi and A S Kiran Kumar
explanation: President Ram Nath Kovind has recently presented the \'Santokbaa Humanitarian Award\' to two noted personalities viz. Child rights activist and Noble Laureate Kailash Satyarthi and space scientist A S Kiran Kumar, former chairman of Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) in Surat, Gujarat. The award, instituted by Shree Ramkrishna Knowledge Foundaton (SRKKF) and led by diamond baron Govind Dholakia, includes a trophy and a prize money of Rs 1 crore each to the awardees. SRKKF confers the award every year for humanitarian contributions by individuals whose life and work are characterised by their selfless and inspiring service.
